title: arputamAghiya virundE
sahitya:
arputamAghiya virundE hari nAma sudhArasa marundE manamE ArvamuDan adai arundE


anupallavi

  karkkaNDu pAlADaik-kaTTi miTTAyinum kanirasap-pAghinum inidini tinididu


caraNam    tinnat-tinna ruci tarum dEva gAna sanjIvi annam paramAnnattilum 
arundiDin magizhum Avi AnandamAi idai sEvi aruL peruvAi ciranjIvi
